meta.description: Delivering a next-level standard in refined living, this hallowed new boutique development on Camps Bay's Exclusive Medburn Drive, offers 4 thoughtfully designed private residences capitalizing on the naturally rich Cape coastal surrounds. What can only be described as ultra-luxe, your Medburn Villa artfully conceptualized by award-winning Architects, Gerd Weideman and Jenny Mills has a design dialogue that captures every need and desire.
meta.title: Medburn Villas
